Manny|Protosynthesis|[silent] | |-fieldend|move: Grassy Terrain |upkeep |c|☆Thunderlord371|*inhales* |c|☆Thunderlord371|"Unfortunate" doesn't begin to describe my series, this game rewards blind luck and nothing else, I am beyond convinced at this point. After getting completely tooled by scheduling with my opponent changing times on me last minute and refusing to provide confirmation prior to the day of the match as to play times, losing this way somehow felt even worse than I had thought possible. My preparation was superior, my play was superior, and I lost, so I don't see a reason to continue engaging in an activity where what is within my control is overwhelmingly outweighed by what is not. |-message|Thunderlord371 forfeited. | |win|ElFelikz |raw|ElFelikz's rating: 1151 → 1173
